import "./post.css"; import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; export default function Post ({post}) { return (
{Users.filter(u=>u.id=== post.userId)[0].profilePicture} Alt {Users.filter(u=>u.id=== post.userId)[0].username} {Users.filter(u=>u.id=== post.userId)[0].username} {post.data}
{post?.desc}
{post.like}
) }
